xml.data:
Home » 30Vbh Vibhaṅgapāḷi » 15 Paṭisambhidāvibhaṅga » 15.1 Suttantabhājanīya
15.1.2 Saccavāra
Paṭisambhidāvibhaṅga
Suttantabhājanīya
Saccavāra
719.
2119Catasso paṭisambhidā—  atthapaṭisambhidā, dhammapaṭisambhidā, niruttipaṭisambhidā, paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā. Dukkhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā, tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā, ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā. Ayaṃ saccavāro.
<< 15.1.1 Saṅgahavāraup15.1.3 Hetuvāra >>
